name: Cartoon Fruit 8192
description:
It is simple game. You will need to swipe to the direction that will merge fruits as that want

There are 2 modes:
Double Fruit that 2 fruits will merge and become bigger fruit.
Triple Fruit that 3 fruits will merge and become bigger fruit

There are 3 Size of board:

3 x 3 that you will win if you get 10 state of fruits
4 x 4 that you will win if you get 11 state of fruits
5 x 5 that you will win if you get 12 state of fruits (Will have 2 fruits appear after each turn)

Note: The smaller garden size is harder.

There are 2 themes for you to change with no cost.
And 2 more themes for you to increase what you play.

For Triple Fruit, you need 3 same fruit to make a merge!
